original_text: When they do know about it they must bring a young bull to the Tent of Meeting. The animal is a sin offering.
korean_text: 그 범한 죄를 깨달으면 회중은 수송아지를 속죄제로 드릴지니 그것을 회막 앞으로 끌어다가

sentences.original_text: When they do know about it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그것에 대해 알게 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: they must bring a young bull
The animal is a sin offering
